For Sale:  3 OJs all graded SGC.

Jumbo Schoeneck, Indianapolis.  SGC 10, Pink.  Back has a Gasper Montan stamp.  $150 ppd.

[url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=687&u=11817413][img]http://i21.servimg.com/u/f21/11/81/74/13/ojtipo10.jpg[/img][/url]

Chippy McGarr and Umpire, K. C., SGC 50.  $300 ppd

[url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=688&u=11817413][img]http://i21.servimg.com/u/f21/11/81/74/13/oj_mcg10.jpg[/img][/url]
